instructions: On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google app . At the bottom right, tap More and then Settings and then Voice . Under "Hey Google," tap Voice Match . Turn on Hey Google .
On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google app . Say "Hey Google" or tap the Microphone .

On your Android phone or tablet, go to myactivity.google.com. On the left, click Other Google activity and then Voice match enrollment and then View data . At the top right, click More and then Delete all .
